attributes.action: Nationalise the Queen's Art Collection (Worth £10bn+) to Help Reduce the National Debt
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the the Royal Collection, worth in excess of ten billion pounds and inaccessible and meaningless to the vast majority of the British people, should be nationalised and sold in order to help fund the national debt.

At a time when British public sector workers are sacrificing their pensions because, they are told, that we are all in it together and must all tighten our belts, it is vital that our head of state is encouraged to lead by example.
